DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether hydration sodium bicarbonate superior hydration saline prevent contrast-induced nephropathy .
DOC.criteria: serum creatinine > 1.1 mg/dL glomerular filtration rate ( GFR ) < 50 mL/min age < 18 year use radiographic contrast medium last 21 day history dialysis cardiac insufficiency class IIIIV emergency procedure
